sen.j: 文華秀麗集（ぶんかしゅうれいしゅう）は、平安時代初期の弘仁9年（818年）に、嵯峨天皇の勅命により編纂された勅撰漢詩集。
sen.e: Bunka Shureishu is a Chokusen kanshishu (a collection of Chinese verses compiled by Imperial command) compiled by the command of Emperor Saga during 818 in the early Heian period.
Bunka Shureishu is a Chokusen Kanshishu (a collection of Chinese verses compiled by Imperial command) compiled at the command of Emperor Saga in 818 during the early Heian period.

sen.e: Bunka Shureishu is a Chokusen Kanshishu (a collection of Chinese verses compiled by Imperial command) compiled at the command of Emperor Saga in 818 during the early Heian period.

sen.j: 先に編纂された凌雲集に続くもので、勅撰三集の一。
sen.e: It succeeded Ryounshu which had been compiled earlier, being one of the three anthologies compiled by Imperial command.

sen.j: 藤原冬嗣、菅原清公などにより編纂された。
sen.e: Bunka Shureishu was compiled by a number of people including FUJIWARA no Fuyutsugu and SUGAWARA no Kiyokimi.

sen.e: There were as many as 28 writers including Emperor Saga and Emperor Junna and it is said that works by the delegates from the country of Bo Hai and poetesses were also part of this anthology
